summary:
I wanted Darker Ebony weapons :)
Mesh fix for a texture bug I found for the Ebony Blade had is included / as standalone.
descriptionHtml:
[color=Lightsteelblue][b]Description :[/b][/color] I wanted darker ebony weapons :)

[color=Lightsteelblue][b]Bow Colours :[/b][/color] After a wee bit o experimenting I decided I preferred an aqua kind of shade for the bits that I deemed should be gemstone-ish on my bowÂ  instead of leather brown and black. That is the version I have been using for the last week or two while playing around with this so I figured I would include it in the main file.. If you hate it though please check the optional files (starting to prefer the black version personally hehe), and if you aren't happy with those I am always open to suggestions in the comments.

[color=Lightsteelblue][b]Ebony Blade Mesh :[/b][/color] This blade caused me a lot of head scratching.. the darker I made the textures the more obvious it became that something was seriously borked hehe. I eventually narrowed it down to an error in the .nif files where they were pointing to an environment cube map instead of the blades actual ebonyblade_M.dds texture.. new one to me !, was seriously the last place I looked to figure out what was going on :/

[color=Lightsteelblue][b]Conflicts :[/b][/color] The mesh I included for the Ebony Blade will conflict with mods that would otherwise replace the vanilla version, for me the only mod this overwrites is [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27178/?]Greatsword Sheaths and Scabbards Redux[/url]. Check my comment on that mod for more info.

[color=Lightsteelblue][b]Installation :[/b][/color] Since this is only a texture replacing mod you can just extract to your data folder / install using a mod manager as normal.

[color=Lightsteelblue][b]Lossless Versions :[/b][/color] These 24/32bit versions give a nicer depth to the textures and should be free from any artifacts, but are much more memory intensive so if you are already low on V-RAM then avoid :).

[color=Lightsteelblue][b]Screenshots :[/b][/color] I used the lossless versions of my textures alongside an edited [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30936/?/]RealVision Nova ENB[/url] with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/?/]Enhanced Lights And FX[/url]

[center]
[color=Lightsteelblue][b](: More Spooky Edits :)

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57178/?]Darker Robes[/url]
[/b][/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56610/?]Darker Jester Clothes[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56587/?]Darker Mehrunes Razor[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55725/?]Darker Dark Brotherhood Shrouded Armor and Robes[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55809/]Reworked Vanilla Female Shrouded Armor Texture Fix[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54816/?]Darker Vampire Armor[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54998/?]Glass Weapons[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54641/?]Darker Falmer Heavy Armor and Weapons[/url][/center]
author: SpookyMunky
